import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Grid, Button, Container, Header, Icon, Form, Label, Menu, Tab, Pagination } from 'semantic-ui-react'; import '../root.scss'; import { FETCH_INSURANCE_COMP } from '../policies/queries' import { useQuery } from '@apollo/react-hooks'; export default function InsuranceCompanyListings(props) { const [insuranceCos, setInsuranceCos] = useState(); const { data } = useQuery(FETCH_INSURANCE_COMP); useEffect(() => { if (data) { setInsuranceCos(data.insuranceCompanies); } }, [data, insuranceCos]); function clientList() { return (
Name
Email
Contact Person
Mobile Number
Physical Address
 {insuranceCos && insuranceCos.items.map((company, key) => ( {company.name} {company.email} {company.contactPerson} {company.telephoneNumber[0] || company.mobileNumber[0]} {company.physicalAddress} ))} ) } const panes = [ { menuItem: ( Insurance Companies ), render: () => { return ( {clientList()}
) }, }, ] return (
Insurance Company Listings {'User'}, Find a list of companies below
Find Client
) }
